DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study was to investigate the effects of low-sodium, high-potassium condiments and salt on blood pressure in untreated (pre)hypertensive Vietnamese adults.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of a Low Sodium-High Potassium Salt on Blood Pressure in Vietnamese Adults
DOC.criteria: Untreated prehypertension or mild hypertension (systolic BP between 130 and 160 mmHg and/or diastolic BP between 85 and 100 mmHg) based on the mean of two measurements with a 1week interval Diagnosed or selfreported cardiovascular disease Diagnosed or selfreported kidney disease
